categories: Category:Imperial Department of Military Research products

nodes.text: The Interplanetary Ion Cannon was a much larger version of Kuat Drive Yards' v-150 anti-orbital ion cannon.
The Interplanetary Ion Cannon was able to target planets at interstellar ranges, and its ion beams could vaporize a terrestrial planet's atmosphere.
The Interplanetary Ion Cannon was a proposed weapons system for the then-in-development Death Star.
